item.description: Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#0130; 04:28AM; 2580 Cahuenga Bl East; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VIRJ44; #HollywoodHills; Despite light wind and embercast, precise LAFD helicopter water drops held the one-eighth (0.125) acre of burning medium-to-heavy brush in check, as ground crews hiked to the east side of the Cahuenga Pass south of the Hollywood Cross to fully contain and extinguish flames in less than an hour. No injury. No structure threat or damage. No evacuation. LAFD ground crews will remain at scene this morning to overhaul and fully extinguish smoldering debris. An adult male will be questioned by LAFD Investigators and LAPD Hollywood Officers (Incident #499) to determine his role, if any, in causing the fire.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC14 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E290 E35 E41 E52 E76 E82 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA27 T27 T35 T90; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0130; 03:37AM; 2580 Cahuenga Bl East; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VIRJ44; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to less than one-eighth (0.125) acre of medium-to-heavy brush being fanned by light wind, burning on the east side of the Cahuenga Pass south of the Hollywood Cross. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E290 E35 E41 E52 E76 E82 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 T27 T35 T90; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Fatality Structure Fire; INC#0032; 02:53AM; 13833 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UEujLZ; #ValleyGlen; The deceased is an adult male. Two dogs were also discovered deceased within the apartment. No other injuries reported. No neighbors displaced. The cause of the fire is under active investigation by Los Angeles Police and Fire Department investigators. A positive identification of the decedent, to include the cause, time and manner of his death, will be determined by the Coroner's Office.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E289 E39 E81 PH1 RA39 T39 T89; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Fatality Structure Fire - Now Out 12/08/2022 INC#0032

item.description: Fatality Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0032; 12:59AM; 13833 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UEujLZ; #ValleyGlen; PRELIM: 28 Firefighters took just 22 minutes (1:21 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within one apartment on the first floor of a 23,523-square-foot, 24 unit two-story apartment building. In extinguishing the fire, responders discovered the remains of one person (unknown age / gender / site affiliation / circumstances ) within the involved unit. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E289 E39 E81 RA39 T39 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0612; 10:26AM; Santa Susana Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3h4cZT5; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a stranded but uninjured adult female hiker with her dog, unable to negotiate steep terrain between O'Melveny Park and the Sunshine Canyon Landfill. An LAFD Flight Paramedic will be lowered to secure her and the animal for an anticipated hoist rescue and transfer to a safe nearby landing location.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 E18 E275 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA75 RH114 T75; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out 12/07/2022 INC#0004

item.description: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0004; 12:02AM; 510 W Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FyHpGk; #Wilmington; 79 LAFD Firefighters took 1 hour and 49 minutes of defensive firefighting operations (1:51 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish flames that consumed a vacant 50' x 100' one-story commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E112 E205 E238 E264 E285 E36 E38 E48 E49 E5 EA1 EM13 HR3 RA38 RA5 T38 T5 T64 T85 UR5 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Brian Humphrey
item.category: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out

item.description: Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1769; 10:02PM; 6062 W Fountain Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3utWP8m; Hollywood; FIRE NOW OUT: At 9:48PM the LAFD received a call for a reported structure fire. The first arriving company found a small, one story bungalow with light smoke showing upon arrival. Firefighters initiated an offensive fire attack and located the fire in one room. They quickly extinguished the fire and conducted a search of the building. Firefighters located a deceased person. The preliminary investigation indicates a potential suspicious death prior to the fire. LAFD Arson and LAPD are responding for the full investigation. No further details at this time. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E35 E52 RA82 T27; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0553; 10:10AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire started in a one story commercial building which was attached (via a division wall) to a two story (street facing) commercial building. The fire extended into the attic of the one story. A primary and secondary search located no occupants in either building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E229 E235 E26 E261 E35 E41 E76 RA27 RA6 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0553; 09:37AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; Building type updated to a single story (exposing a two story attached commercial building). Firefighters are making good progress with the interior fire extinguished and are working to make access and extinguish the fire which extended to the attic.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E35 E41 E76 RA27 RA6 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0553; 09:37AM; 1354 N Highland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P03ReH; Hollywood; Two story, commercial building with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. This incident was initially reported as "bells ringing" automatic alarm and the first arriving company upgraded it to a structure fire incident. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E35 E41 RA6 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
